content: make this crochet lovey pattern for your favorite little marsupial the koala works up quickly using only one skein and some scrap yarn which makes it a perfect baby shower gift idea instructions include a bow that can be used as a bowtie or a ear bow making this crochet toy totally gender neutral get the full free pattern and lots of photos on the blog 1 1 http //makeanddocrew com/koala-free-crochet-lovey-pattern/
